entry.title: ​​Nexo To Acquire Competing Crypto Lender Vauld
entry.summary: “We've signed an indicative term sheet with Nexo to acquire up to 100% of Vauld,” co-founder Darshan Bathija tweeted early Tuesday.

entry.title: Earn Passive Income With Idle NFTs Using Inventory Staking on NFTx
entry.summary: Inventory Staking is a brand new feature added to the NFTX V2 Protocol, allowing anyone to add their floor-priced NFTs to a vault and stake their position on the Stake page to receive part of the vault fees. This allows you to receive a passive income on all your floor NFTs which you otherwise would … Earn Passive Income With Idle NFTs Using Inventory Staking on NFTx Read More »
